welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sungailiat, Indonesia! Get ready to be enchanted by our beautiful beaches, rich culture, and delicious seafood. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Pauw's Kopitiam Cafe
restaurants.description: Pauw's Kopitiam Cafe is a noodle restaurant located in Sungailiat.
restaurants.address: Jalan RE. Martadinata No.8, Sungailiat, Kep. Babel

restaurants.name: Raja Laut Restaurant - Sungai Liat, Bangka
